## Figure Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER." The text is in bold, uppercase letters. The font is black, and it is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 4 WCM Kraftvolle Sauberkeit: Der K 4 WCM mit wassergekühltem Motor ist ideal für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen an Autos, Gartenzaunen oder Fahrrädern geeignet. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.324-200.0 - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278907154
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,8
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 11,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 14,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 329 × 901
## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 6 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description of the Image The image displays a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with a handle on top for easy transport. It has a compact design with wheels at the base for mobility. The pressure washer is accompanied by a black hose, a spray gun, and two different nozzles for varied cleaning tasks. ### Additional Details - **Awards and Recognition**: - The image includes several logos and awards: - A "Record Holder" badge from the Guinness World Records. - A "World's No. 1" product seal. - An "iF Design Award" logo. - A "Red Dot Winner 2023" logo. - A "Made in Europe" emblem. These elements suggest the product is highly recognized for its design and performance. I'm unable to accurately read the text from the image you provided. The text appears to be blurred or unclear. If you can provide a clearer image or describe the content, I'd be happy to help with the Markdown representation.

chunks.text:
## Figure Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER." The text is in bold, uppercase letters. The font is black, and it is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 4 WCM

Kraftvolle Sauberkeit: Der K 4 WCM mit wassergekühltem Motor ist ideal für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen an Autos, Gartenzaunen oder Fahrrädern geeignet.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.324-200.0

- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel
- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278907154
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,8
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 11,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 14,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 329 × 901

## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 6 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description of the Image

The image displays a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with a handle on top for easy transport. It has a compact design with wheels at the base for mobility. The pressure washer is accompanied by a black hose, a spray gun, and two different nozzles for varied cleaning tasks.

### Additional Details

- **Awards and Recognition**:
  - The image includes several logos and awards:
    - A "Record Holder" badge from the Guinness World Records.
    - A "World's No. 1" product seal.
    - An "iF Design Award" logo.
    - A "Red Dot Winner 2023" logo.
    - A "Made in Europe" emblem.

These elements suggest the product is highly recognized for its design and performance.

I'm unable to accurately read the text from the image you provided. The text appears to be blurred or unclear. If you can provide a clearer image or describe the content, I'd be happy to help with the Markdown representation.
